com.simbachain.auth

Interface AccessTokenProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AzCredentialAccessTokenProvider, AzUserAccessTokenProvider, LocalTokenProvider

    public interface AccessTokenProvider
    Provides an AccessToken. AuthConfig implementations provide access to an instance of this interface in order for clients to be able to grab a token.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccessToken getToken()
      Get the token

    • Method Detail

      • getToken

        AccessToken getToken()
              throws com.simbachain.SimbaException
        Get the token
        Returns:
        an AccessToken
        Throws:
        com.simbachain.SimbaException - if an error occurs
